title: Durian Runtuh - Hack-A-Tech PNB-JewelTech 2022
description: Built Durian Runtuh, a prize-linked investment savings app which rewards tickets every time user invests in ASB. These tickets stands a chance to win a prize every week.
body:
> * Built Durian Runtuh, a prize-linked investment savings app which rewards tickets every time user invests in ASB. These tickets stands a chance to win a prize every week.
> * Was the sole programmer in the team, built the app using Ionic, Vue, Tailwind, and Capacitor
> * Did not managed to qualify Top 5
